amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the Secretary to provide technical assistance on construction to a state agency that is carrying out congressionally authorized projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Shuster.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
